original_text: Now Heber the Kenite had separated from the Kenites, the descendants of Hobab the father-in-law of Moses, and had pitched his tent as far away as the oak in Zaanannim, which is near Kedesh.
korean_text: 모세의 장인 호밥의 자손 중 겐 사람 헤벨이 떠나 게데스에 가까운 사아난님 상수리나무 곁에 이르러 장막을 쳤더라

sentences.original_text: Now Heber the Kenite had separated from the Kenites
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 헤버라는 겐 사람은 겐 사람들에게서 떨어져 나왔는데

sentences.original_text: the descendants of Hobab the father-in-law of Moses
and had pitched his tent as far away as the oak in Zaanannim
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 사아난님 상수리나무 곁에 장막을 쳤는데
